definitions.definition: An uncertain duration of time, a period of time.
definitions.example: He lectured for quite a long while.

definitions.definition: To occupy or entertain (someone) in order to let time pass.

definitions.example: He was sleeping while I was singing.
This case, while interesting, is a bit frustrating.
I'll wait while you've finished painting.
While you're at school you may live at home.

definitions.definition: (public policy) Used to denote an individual experiencing racial profiling when performing a seemingly benign activity.
definitions.example: He was detained for four hours at the store yesterday. His crime? Shopping while black.
